vivae.ros.simulator.engine
Interface Simulation

All Superinterfaces:
ExternalSimulation
All Known Subinterfaces:
AgentRegisteringSimulation
All Known Implementing Classes:
KeyControlledDataPublishingVivaeSim, KeyControlledDataPublishingVivaeSim, KeyControlledVivaeSimulator, KeyControlledVivaeSimulator, VivaeSimulatorOne
public interface Simulation
extends ExternalSimulation

Basic is externalSimulation, this can be used either locally or over the ROS network provided by the SimulatorServer. This is extension for local use.
